TopicTitle: Triple-J Space Company: A slightly cursed RP1 Career

Articles.Content:
MAY 1948: A mysterious eccentric by the name of Jimothy Jimbo Jimson sells tonnes of gold and purchases a plot of land in Florida.

AUGUST 1949: Jimothy Jimbo Jimson hires many rocket scientists and engineers to develop prototypes

JANUARY 1951: The Triple-J Space Company is officially opened

 

hey guys, i'm finally documenting my RP1 career! expect a new entry twice a week!
